scripts.deploy:with-cors: nuxt build && node scripts/configure-storage-cors.js && firebase deploy
scripts.deploy:preview: NITRO_PRESET=firebase nuxt build && firebase hosting:channel:deploy $(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD) --expires 7d
scripts.deploy:preview:dev: dotenv -c dev NITRO_PRESET=firebase nuxt build && firebase use dev && firebase hosting:channel:deploy $(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD) --expires 7d
scripts.dev:emulators: firebase emulators:start --import=./.firebase-emulator-data --export-on-exit & dotenv -c dev FIREBASE_USE_EMULATOR=true nuxt dev
scripts.save:preview-url: node -e "const branchName = require('child_process').execSync('git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD', {encoding: 'utf8'}).trim(); console.log('Preview URL: https://'+branchName+'--'+require('./firebase.json').hosting.site+'.web.app');"
scripts.monitor:functions:prod: node monitor-functions.js --project=$(firebase use prod >/dev/null && firebase use | grep -o 'Active Project: .*' | cut -d' ' -f3) --duration=60
scripts.monitor:functions:dev: node monitor-functions.js --project=$(firebase use dev >/dev/null && firebase use | grep -o 'Active Project: .*' | cut -d' ' -f3) --duration=30
